DOC.brief_summary: Plasmin is expected to create a posterior vitreous detachment. The pharmacological creation of a posterior vitreous detachment may be beneficial in a variety of conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Plasmin for the Creation of a Posterior Vitreous Detachment
DOC.criteria: Patients who would benefit from a posterior vitreous detachment, as determined by the evaluating ophthalmologist. Presence of a posterior vitreous detachment in the study eye History of vitrectomy in the study eye Proliferative diabetic retinopathy in the study eye Presence of media opacity that precludes quality examination of the vitreous and fundus.
